summary: France, 1815. After his defeat at Waterloo, Napoleon heads for exile. Royalists occupy Paris and attempt to restore the monarchy. However, the battle doesn't seem to be over. On July 6, ... See full summary »
cast: Michel Piccoli|Claude Brasseur|Claude Rich|Ticky Holgado|Yann Collette|Stéphane Jobert|Alexandra Vandernoot|Lionel Vitrant|Alexandre Brasseur|Didier Cauchy|Jean-Luc Bourre|Bernard Cazauran|Jean Dupouy|Gilles Henry|Alain Moglia|Serge Delanoue
title: Le souper
